hero.title: Professional Tree Care for Gardens and Mountains
hero.subtitle: We cut, trim, and take care of trees safely. From private gardens to mountain land.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We provide a wide range of tree care services to meet your needs.

garden.title: Garden Tree Cutting & Trimming
garden.description: Pruning and cutting trees in private gardens. We ensure your garden looks beautiful and clean.

mountain.title: Mountain and Slope Tree Cutting
mountain.description: Specialized equipment for difficult terrains. We handle large scale forestry work safely.

dangerous.title: Dangerous or Fallen Trees
dangerous.description: Emergency removal of trees that pose a risk to property or people. Available for urgent calls.

care.title: Regular Care Plan
care.description: Scheduled maintenance to keep your trees healthy and safe year-round.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyChooseUs.subtitle: We are dedicated to providing the best service with safety and quality.

versatile.title: We handle both gardens and mountains
versatile.description: From a single garden tree to a whole mountain forest, we have the expertise and equipment.

safety.title: Safety first in every job
safety.description: We strictly follow safety protocols to protect our workers, your property, and the environment.

pricing.title: Clear and fair pricing
pricing.description: We provide detailed quotes before starting any work. No hidden fees or surprises.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple steps to get your trees taken care of.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Fill out the form or call us.

check.title: On-site check
check.description: We visit to assess the situation.

serviceAreas.title: Service Areas
serviceAreas.description: We serve local cities and surrounding areas. Contact us to check if your location is available.

items.question: Do you offer free quotes?
items.answer: Yes, we offer free on-site estimates for all our services.

items.question: Can you handle tall trees?
items.answer: Absolutely. We have specialized equipment for high tree climbing and cutting.

items.question: Do you remove the waste?
items.answer: Yes, we can remove all branches and logs, or leave them for firewood if you prefer.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Send us a message for a free quote.

form.name: Name
form.success: Thank you! Your email client should open now.
